name: Import Optimizer
description: Automatically removes unused imports and optimizes import statements

condition.script: const fs = require('fs'); const filePath = process.env.KIRO_FILE_PATH; if (!filePath) return false; const content = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8'); return content.includes('import') && (content.match(/import.*from/g) || []).length > 0;
